title: I Disenchanted a skin i didnt mean to
body: It was a championship kalista and i saved up 6300 ip to buy her and use the skin but i ended up disenchanting the skin anything i can do to get it back?

replies.body: Oh no!  Did the essences end up being used at all?  It's super important to be careful to review the confirmation window before proceeding with the fuse, but we might be able to help.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look at your specific case directly to see if there are options.  See you there!
I still have all of the essence and can u guild me through this cuz i did one earlier but it said that its invalid
